::Battera::

"I shall go and greet this bot then."  She walked to the entrance and 
opened the hatch. "What is it that you want?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Dark One/Alliance Base::
> 
> Zardus looks from Battera to Dark One, who had just come up to him, 
carrying 
> Squizzy. His wrist comp beeps a bit, reporting a bot near the door. 
He taps a 
> few keys to stop the autoguns from opening fire.
> 
> "There's a bot near the entrance," he says to Battera, "Can you 
show her in, 
> ask her what she wants, and make sure she doesn't go loose in the 
base? I 
> have to attend to this bot."
> 
> He takes Squizzy from Dark One, walking off toward the lab.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Alliance base's autoguns recognize DevilDuer's DNA, but also 
recognize 
> Lady Hawk's. The doors stay closed, the autoguns aiming at Lady 
Hawk, ready 
> to fire just in case.
